mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attration (place_name, place_location, place_explain, place_img_location, category_group_name, place_img_c1, place_img_c2, place_img_c3, place_img_c4) VALUES (#{placeName}, #{placeLocation}, #{placeExplain}, #{placeImgLocation}, #{categoryGroupName}, #{placeImgC1}, #{placeImgC2}, #{placeImgC3}, #{placeImgC4})
